descriptor.name: Atma Nirbhar Bagwani Yojana (ANBY) Enrollment Specialist
descriptor.short_desc: Become an expert in guiding Arunachal Pradesh farmers to secure loans and subsidies for horticultural development.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module provides comprehensive training on the Atma Nirbhar Bagwani Yojana (ANBY), a credit-linked subsidy scheme by the Government of Arunachal Pradesh. Agents will learn the financial structure, application process, and how to help farmers and SHGs leverage this scheme for horticultural growth.

  1. Scheme Structure:
    Understand the 45-45-10 financial model: 45% government subsidy, 45% bank loan, and 10% farmer contribution. Learn about collateral-free loan limits for individuals (₹1.6 Lakhs) and SHGs (₹10 Lakhs).
  2. Application Process:
    Master the offline application process, including required documents like Aadhaar Card, Voter Card, and Residential Certificate. Learn which banks are partnered with the scheme.
  3. Benefits Communication:
    Learn to effectively explain the benefits of cultivating high-value crops like orange, kiwi, and banana, and acquiring machinery like tractors and power tillers through the scheme.

Why Take This Course:

  • Empower farmers in Arunachal Pradesh to become self-reliant.
  • Specialize in a high-impact state-level agricultural finance scheme.
  • Enhance your role as a key financial and agricultural advisor in the community.

descriptor.name: Arunachal Pradesh Agri-Finance Council
descriptor.short_desc: Dedicated to training agents on state-level agricultural and horticultural financial schemes.
descriptor.long_desc: The Arunachal Pradesh Agri-Finance Council focuses on enabling self-reliance for farmers by providing in-depth knowledge of government credit and subsidy programs.
